
━━━━━ NattyUI: All Attribute and Defined Color Names ━━━━━

/b                  bright_magenta         on_blue          
/bg                 bright_red             on_bright_black  
/bl                 bright_white           on_bright_blue   
/blink              bright_yellow          on_bright_cyan   
/bold               conceal                on_bright_green  
/conceal            conceal_off            on_bright_magenta
/curly_underline    curly_underline        on_bright_red    
/dashed_underline   curly_underline_off    on_bright_white  
/dotted_underline   cyan                   on_bright_yellow 
/encircled          dashed_underline       on_cyan          
/faint              dashed_underline_off   on_default       
/fg                 default                on_green         
/fraktur            default_font           on_magenta       
/framed             dotted_underline       on_red           
/i                  dotted_underline_off   on_white         
/inv                double_underline       on_yellow        
/invert             doubly                 overlined        
/italic             encircled              overlined_off    
/overlined          encircled_off          primary_font     
/prop               faint                  prop             
/proportional       faint_off              proportional     
/s                  fg_black               proportional_off 
/sp                 fg_blue                rapid_blink      
/spacing            fg_bright_black        red              
/strike             fg_bright_blue         reset            
/sub                fg_bright_cyan         reveal           
/subscript          fg_bright_green        s                
/sup                fg_bright_magenta      slow_blink       
/superscript        fg_bright_red          sp               
/u                  fg_bright_white        spacing          
/ul                 fg_bright_yellow       spacing_off      
/underline          fg_cyan                strike           
b                   fg_default             strike_off       
bg_black            fg_green               sub              
bg_blue             fg_magenta             subscript        
bg_bright_black     fg_red                 subscript_off    
bg_bright_blue      fg_white               sup              
bg_bright_cyan      fg_yellow              superscript      
bg_bright_green     font1                  superscript_off  
bg_bright_magenta   font2                  u                
bg_bright_red       font3                  ul_black         
bg_bright_white     font4                  ul_blue          
bg_bright_yellow    font5                  ul_bright_black  
bg_cyan             font6                  ul_bright_blue   
bg_default          font7                  ul_bright_cyan   
bg_green            font8                  ul_bright_green  
bg_magenta          font9                  ul_bright_magenta
bg_red              fraktur                ul_bright_red    
bg_white            fraktur_off            ul_bright_white  
bg_yellow           framed                 ul_bright_yellow 
bl                  framed_off             ul_cyan          
black               green                  ul_default       
blink               hide                   ul_green         
blink_off           i                      ul_magenta       
blue                inv                    ul_red           
bold                invert                 ul_white         
bold_off            invert_off             ul_yellow        
bright_black        italic                 underline        
bright_blue         italic_off             underline_off    
bright_cyan         magenta                white            
bright_green        on_black               yellow
